Katie Heaney bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ BuzzFeed, onye edemede ukwu maka The Cut, na odee. Akwụkwọ ya gụnyere Never Have I Ever, Dear Emma, Would You Rather?, Girl Crushed, na The Year I Stopped Trying.
Akwụkwọ mbụ Heaney dere mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na BuzzFeed, bụ Never Have I Ever: My Life (So Far) Without a Date, nke e bipụtara na 2014

Akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ na-akọ akụkọ ndụ ya ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise ma na-akọ otú o si ghara inwe, tupu oge ahụ, enyi nwoke. N'afọ 2016, e bipụtara mmelite Heaney nke Jane Austen's Emma. N'afọ 2018, Heaney bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta nke abụọ, Would You Rather?: A Memoir of Growing Up and Coming Out

Would You Rather? na-ekwu maka ụzọ Heaney si pụta ma ghọta onwe ya. E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ YA mbụ ya, Girl Crushed, n'afọ 2020. E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ YA nke abụọ ya, The Year I Stopped Trying, na 2021.
A mụrụ Heaney ma zụlite ya na St
Paul na Shoreview, Minnesota. Ọ pụtara dị ka nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ n'afọ 2015. Tụpụ afọ 2018, Heaney lụrụ Lydia. Ọ bi na New York ugbu a.
